(whew! that's alot to remember! so you CAN do that many actions!...Crow Lord
lyed..heehee..) Radistor is hit by all the shots and one of the heads fall
off...a claw comes down and grabs the head and retracts it.....they
transform back to robot mode.....Radistor pulls out a nightstick.....spins
it....swings it....also punches, kicks, and head butts all while the still
exposed dino head continues biting.... (whew!)....oh, yeah, the base has a
big hole in the side 7 feet long and 7 feet wide......the base also is
running out of external autoguns........and the shield lost power so it
won't be as deadly........and Plinissa was aiming for a while before her gun
chair was destroyed.......
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 27, 2000 12:49 AM
Subject: Re: (unknown)


> Nemesis Enforcer/Koga Shuko/Oblitertron/Hades/Anubis/Unitron/Scattershot:
>
> (Code, post the damage for the base, and what was Plintissa aiming at?
> Please be a little more specific about stuff like that)
>
> Oblitertron cried out as shots hit his left cheek, Dark One losing
control,
> Pyro taking control.  Laughing evily in a deep voice, swinging his hands
in a
> backhand to try and knock off the heads (knock them away), one of the
heads
> bit Oblitertron's shoulder (hope you don't take that as moding), taking an
> energon saber from subspace, Oblitertron swung upwards at the neck, firing
> two powerful optic blasts at Radistor's back, firing a burst of flames in
a
> kind of wave so they go at three of his heads, raising his plasma rifle
and
> firing two shots off at the base of one of the necks, another kick to the
> right like a wrecking ball at the badly damaged (I'm assuming it is from
the
> constant beating)
> ---------------
> Nemesis Enforcer raised his missile launcher, firing off a rocket at the
now
> in dino-mode Radistor's front left leg.
> --------------
> Koga Shuko raised his missile launcher firing off a missile at the space
in
> between two autoguns, jumping to the side as enemy fire knicked his left
foot.
> --------------
> Hades fired off a rocket at the 'chest' area of the dino-mode gestalt
> (Radistor).
> -------------
> Anubis pulled out his plasma rifle, firing off a rocket at one of
Radistor's
> faces, firing off a few plasma blasts at the autoguns.
> -------------
> Scattershot, up in the air, took out two charges, chucking them down at
> Suukie, each set to explode on impact.  Taking out a homemade bomb, with
the
> strength of three missiles from a rocket launcher, dropped the bomb down
at
> the middle of Raditor's back.
>
>
